mapper.sql:
t.dataset_key, t.id, t.parent_id, t.status, t.name_phrase, t.extinct, (select count(*) from name_usage c WHERE c.dataset_key=#{datasetKey} AND c.parent_id=t.id AND NOT is_synonym(c.status) AND (c.extinct IS NULL OR NOT c.extinct)) AS child_count,
,
NULL AS dataset_sectors, NULL AS sector_key, NULL AS est_id, NULL AS ed_id
t.dataset_sectors, s.subject_dataset_key AS sector_dataset_key, s.mode AS sector_mode,
s.id AS sector_key, NULL AS est_id,
t.sector_key AS sector_key, NULL AS ed_id,
name_usage t JOIN name n ON t.dataset_key=n.dataset_key AND t.name_id=n.id

if.if: LEFT JOIN decision ed ON ed.subject_id=t.id AND ed.dataset_key=#{catalogueKey} AND ed.subject_dataset_key=#{datasetKey} LEFT JOIN sector s ON s.subject_id=t.id AND s.dataset_key=#{catalogueKey} AND s.subject_dataset_key=#{datasetKey} AND s.placeholder_rank IS NULL
LEFT JOIN estimate est ON est.target_id=t.id AND est.dataset_key=#{datasetKey} LEFT JOIN sector s ON s.id=t.sector_key AND s.dataset_key=#{catalogueKey}

sql.if: AND (t.extinct IS NULL OR NOT t.extinct)

mapper.select: SELECT FROM WHERE t.dataset_key=#{key.datasetKey} AND AND NOT is_synonym(t.status) ORDER BY t.ordinal, n.rank, n.scientific_name

WITH first AS ( SELECT n.rank FROM
WHERE t.dataset_key=#{key.datasetKey} AND AND NOT is_synonym(status)
AND n.rank > #{rank}::rank
ORDER BY n.rank, n.scientific_name LIMIT 1 ) SELECT
FROM, first WHERE t.dataset_key=#{key.datasetKey} AND AND NOT is_synonym(t.status) AND first.rank=n.rank ORDER BY n.rank, n.scientific_name

WITH RECURSIVE x AS( SELECT FROM WHERE t.dataset_key=#{key.datasetKey} AND t.id = #{key.id} UNION SELECT
FROM, x WHERE t.dataset_key=#{key.datasetKey} AND t.id = x.parent_id ) SELECT * FROM x

SELECT DISTINCT n.rank FROM WHERE t.dataset_key=#{key.datasetKey} AND AND NOT is_synonym(t.status)
AND n.rank <= #{rank}::rank
ORDER BY n.rank

SELECT DISTINCT t.sector_key FROM name_usage t
JOIN name n ON n.dataset_key=#{key.datasetKey} AND t.name_id=n.id
WHERE t.dataset_key=#{key.datasetKey} AND
AND n.rank > #{rank}::rank
